28.eng-name: Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) saw an old man walking, supported by his two sons, and asked about him. The people informed him that he had vowed to go on foot (to the Ka`ba). He said, "Allah is not in need of this old man's torturing himself," and ordered him to ride

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ نَذَرَ الْمَشْىَ إِلَى الْكَعْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever vowed to go on foot to the Ka'bah
